content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Usually mail redirection is requested together with urgent disabling of EPAMer’s domain account. Often (but not always) urgent disabling is required due to person’s dismissal. However, mail redirection can be requested when an EPAMer goes on Parental (Maternity) / Sabbatical / Military Service (Extended) Leave (i.e. for non-dismissed EPAMers).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mail redirection to another EPAM mailbox is treated as an exceptional case and strong reasons are required to arrange such forwarding. Usually, it is required due to some security reasons (e.g., to make sure that some sensitive or confidential information was not disclosed). Also, mail redirection can be requested in order to be able to perform the duties of a person who will be on a Parental / Sabbatical / Military Service Leave. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study information about establishing mail forward or mail redirection in article: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/SpzAFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mail redirection (forwarding) establishing\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your Mentor for requests on mail forward/mail redirect.\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
